text: Gu mbararagim, guma kamthooŋ mbe Hevenan kav, khɨrɨv kaav, khaŋ nzuai, “Nza Fhe Bakɨme ntigem taagia nza ndigi. Ana ŋkasŋka, ana ntigem za kɨrar hɨgi. Ana ntigem nzan ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan ki. Ana taagip wo gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav kha guman farasarigi. Ana won zɨ bakɨme gum ŋkasŋka bakɨme ndi khɨvigi. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, mba nza phorgɨp guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi bunin mbe sav, mbe nzuav nzuai guma, ana Fhe Bakɨme nɨman, ana ra gu maan buni mbe sav, mbe nzuai. Ana ntigem Fhe Bakɨmen enseri ana fega nɨɨŋ khɨngi.
